interpretation: The ninja emoji represents stealth, cunning, and agility. It is a symbol of someone who is skilled in the art of deception and able to move unnoticed through their environment. The ninja is a master of disguise, able to blend in and adapt to any situation. This card can indicate the need for strategy and a willingness to take calculated risks in order to achieve your goals. It may also suggest the need to be cautious and keep your intentions hidden from others. The ninja is a reminder to trust your instincts and be aware of your surroundings. You may need to be patient and wait for the right moment to strike. Overall, this card encourages you to embrace your inner warrior and use your skills and talents to overcome any obstacles in your path.
